# Relari CLI

```bash
relari-cli projects ls
relari-cli projects new PROJECT_ID
relari-cli datasets ls --project PROJECT_ID
relari-cli datasets new --project PROJECT_ID DATASET_PATH
poetry run relari-cli datasets get DATASET_ID OUT_DIR
relari-cli evaluations ls --project PROJECT_ID
relari-cli evaluations get EVALUATION_ID OUT_DIR
```
